thread.section_title: HDIS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HDIS | www.hdis.com | 3 of 116
thread.title: Valerie

author: Valerie
title: Valerie
text: Incontinence is embarrassing and troublesome to deal with at first. I'd seen commercials for HDIS on television for years, but didn't realize I'd ever need these products. Suddenly, I did. HDIS customer service was very helpful when I purchased the wrong item and needed to exchange for what I needed. HDIS offers a nice variety of products that have helped me adjust to my new reality more easily. Thank you.
